alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Madison and northeastern Franklin Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Saint Paul to 6 miles southeast of Cass. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Cass... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Boston... Dutton... Barnes... Red Star... Redding... Brashears... Combs... Turners Bend... Taft... Paradise... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
